tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE login_attempts (
  id INT,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR,
  ip_address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE access_permissions_changes (
  id INT,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action VARCHAR,
  previous_permissions JSON,
  new_permissions JSON
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    action_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    action_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE audit_login_attempts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type STRING,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE audit_access_permissions (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type STRING,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action STRING
);

CREATE TABLE audit_table_changes (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type STRING,
    table_name STRING,
    action STRING,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE audit_security_events (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type STRING,
    description STRING,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE audit_database_changes (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type STRING,
    change_type STRING,
    table_name STRING,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
